md:
giải nghĩa từ "pit" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Pit (noun) : hố, lỗ, huyệt
	+ Ex: The pit in the road was deep and wide.
	+ Related words: hole, trench, ditch, crater

* Pit (verb) : đối kháng, cạnh tranh
	+ Ex: The two teams will pit their skills against each other in the final game.
	+ Related words: compete, rival, contest, oppose

* Pit (noun) : hạt, nhân
	+ Ex: The pit of the peach is hard and bitter.
	+ Related words: stone, kernel, core, seed

* Pit (noun) : khu vực, vùng
	+ Ex: The pit area is where the cars are serviced during the race.
	+ Related words: area, zone, region, sector
html:
giải nghĩa từ "pit" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Pit (noun) : hố, lỗ, huyệt

    • Ex: The pit in the road was deep and wide.
    • Related words: hole, trench, ditch, crater

  • Pit (verb) : đối kháng, cạnh tranh

    • Ex: The two teams will pit their skills against each other in the final game.
    • Related words: compete, rival, contest, oppose

  • Pit (noun) : hạt, nhân

    • Ex: The pit of the peach is hard and bitter.
    • Related words: stone, kernel, core, seed

  • Pit (noun) : khu vực, vùng

    • Ex: The pit area is where the cars are serviced during the race.
    • Related words: area, zone, region, sector
